EN

A leveraged Ethereum position built by Jack Yi's Trend Research continues to unwind under pressure. The position, assembled through Aave's lending protocol and reported to have reached roughly $958 million in borrowed stablecoins at its peak, has been shrinking through repeated defensive sales as Ethereum's price declines. On Feb. 4, Trend deposited another 10,000 ETH [‚Ä¶] The post Ethereum hit by billion dollar sell pressure as top crypto fund faces $862M high stakes liquidation risk appeared first on CryptoSlate.
